description:
An online agentbox to extract features for predicting RNA-protein interactions.

Explore and create dataset.
name: RPINBASE

metadata.abstract: Â© 2020 Elsevier Inc.Feature extraction is one of the most important preprocessing steps in predicting the interactions between RNAs and proteins by applying machine learning approaches. Despite many efforts in this area, still, no suitable structural feature extraction agent has been designed. Therefore, an online agentbox, named RPINBASE which can be applied to different scopes of biological applications, is introduced in this paper. This agentbox employs efficient nested queries that enhance the speed of the requests and produces desired features in the form of positive and negative samples. To show the capabilities of the proposed agentbox, the developed agentbox was investigated in the aptamer design problem, and the obtained results are discussed. RPINBASE is an online agentbox and is accessible at http://rpinbase.com.
metadata.title: RPINBASE: An online agentbox to extract features for predicting RNA-protein interactions
